00020 #ifndef _XENO_ASM_I386_ATOMIC_H
00021 #define _XENO_ASM_I386_ATOMIC_H
00022 
00023 #include <linux/bitops.h>
00024 
00025 #ifdef __KERNEL__
00026 
00027 #include <asm/atomic.h>
00028 #include <asm/system.h>
00029 
00030 #define atomic_xchg(ptr,v)       xchg(ptr,v)
00031 #define atomic_cmpxchg(ptr,o,n)  cmpxchg(ptr,o,n)
00032 #define xnarch_memory_barrier()  smp_mb()
00033 
00034 #else /* !__KERNEL__ */
00035 
00036 #ifndef likely
00037 #if __GNUC__ == 2 && __GNUC_MINOR__ < 96
00038 #define __builtin_expect(x, expected_value) (x)
00039 #endif
00040 #define likely(x)       __builtin_expect(!!(x), 1)
00041 #define unlikely(x)     __builtin_expect(!!(x), 0)
00042 #endif /* !likely */
00043 
00044 #define read_cr4() ({ \
00045         unsigned int __dummy; \
00046         __asm__( \
00047                 "movl %%cr4,%0\n\t" \
00048                 :"=r" (__dummy)); \
00049         __dummy; \
00050 })
00051 
00052 #define write_cr4(x) \
00053         __asm__ __volatile__("movl %0,%%cr4": :"r" (x));
00054 
00055 #include <asm/atomic.h>
00056 
00057 struct __xeno_xchg_dummy { unsigned long a[100]; };
00058 #define __xeno_xg(x) ((struct __xeno_xchg_dummy *)(x))
00059 
00060 static inline unsigned long atomic_xchg (volatile void *ptr,
00061                                          unsigned long x)
00062 {
00063     __asm__ __volatile__(LOCK_PREFIX "xchgl %0,%1"
00064                          :"=r" (x)
00065                          :"m" (*__xeno_xg(ptr)), "0" (x)
00066                          :"memory");
00067     return x;
00068 }
00069 
00070 static inline unsigned long atomic_cmpxchg (volatile void *ptr,
00071                                             unsigned long o,
00072                                             unsigned long n)
00073 {
00074     unsigned long prev;
00075 
00076     __asm__ __volatile__(LOCK_PREFIX "cmpxchgl %1,%2"
00077                          : "=a"(prev)
00078                          : "q"(n), "m" (*__xeno_xg(ptr)), "0" (o)
00079                          : "memory");
00080 
00081     return prev;
00082 }
00083 
00084 #define xnarch_memory_barrier()  __asm__ __volatile__("": : :"memory")
00085 
00086 /* Depollute the namespace a bit. */
00087 #undef ADDR
00088 
00089 #endif /* __KERNEL__ */
00090 
00091 typedef atomic_t atomic_counter_t;
00092 typedef unsigned long atomic_flags_t;

00094 #define xnarch_atomic_set(pcounter,i)          atomic_set(pcounter,i)
00095 #define xnarch_atomic_get(pcounter)            atomic_read(pcounter)
00096 #define xnarch_atomic_inc(pcounter)            atomic_inc(pcounter)
00097 #define xnarch_atomic_dec(pcounter)            atomic_dec(pcounter)
00098 #define xnarch_atomic_inc_and_test(pcounter)   atomic_inc_and_test(pcounter)
00099 #define xnarch_atomic_dec_and_test(pcounter)   atomic_dec_and_test(pcounter)
00100 #define xnarch_atomic_set_mask(pflags,mask)    atomic_set_mask(mask,pflags)
00101 #define xnarch_atomic_clear_mask(pflags,mask)  atomic_clear_mask(mask,pflags)

00103 #define xnarch_atomic_xchg(ptr,x) atomic_xchg(ptr,x)
